# branch checkout prompt supports sorting by committerdate.

as 'Test <test@example.com>'
at '2025-02-19T17:00:00Z'

cd repo
git init
git commit --allow-empty -m 'Initial commit'
gs repo init

# A couple tracked branches, and a couple untracked.
at '2025-02-19T17:05:00Z'
git add aaa.txt
gs bc aaa -m 'Add aaa'

at '2025-02-19T17:10:00Z'
git checkout -b ccc
git add ccc.txt
git commit -m 'Add ccc'

gs trunk

at '2025-02-19T17:15:00Z'
git add bbb.txt
gs bc bbb -m 'add bbb.txt'

at '2025-02-19T17:20:00Z'
git checkout -b ddd
git add ddd.txt
git commit -m 'Add ddd'

at '2025-02-19T17:25:00Z'
git checkout -b bcd main
git merge -m 'Merge many' aaa bbb ccc ddd

env ROBOT_INPUT=$WORK/robot.golden ROBOT_OUTPUT=$WORK/robot.actual

# default sort order
gs trunk
gs branch checkout -u
git branch --show-current
stdout 'bbb'

# sort by committerdate
gs trunk
gs branch checkout -u --sort=committerdate
git branch --show-current
stdout 'aaa'

# sort by committerdate descending
gs trunk
gs branch checkout -u --sort=-committerdate
git branch --show-current
stdout 'bbb'


cmp $WORK/robot.actual $WORK/robot.golden

-- repo/aaa.txt --
whatever

-- repo/bbb.txt --
whatever

-- repo/ccc.txt --
whatever

-- repo/ddd.txt --
whatever

> ┣━□ bbb
